I don't get it.  Can't find any mention of a 154 min version anywhere.  Also, when I look at the cover for this one, it says 127 mins...  So I'm confused about which version this is.  

I want the US theatrical cut, which is Romero's self-proclaimed directors cut...

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Dawn_of_the_Dead_versions

Because, like the 156 minutes version, the 154 minutes version is not official. Made by fans, and it is a compilation of several versions.

The German (Krekel's) version is badly remixed.
The 154 minutes version is much better.
